reviews.review_text: I ve build a few houses in the last few years and had a great experience with Repel Technologies on my latest project. They use quality products and are knowledgeable with the latest technologies available.  Alvin provided me with professional advice that was invaluable in choosing the best products for my home. Felix was an excellent installer who worked carefully and made sure everything was working properly. keep up the great work!

I would recommend Sam and their team for all sorts of jobs big and small. Their team is professional and organized. Sam is excellent at providing his expert opinion to save homeowners money and make the best overall project. Ive used Repel for many projects and could not recommend them enough.

I used Repel for my house and I was amazed at the professional and quality of work done by Sam and his crew. They were on time organized and did not leave any mess behind for me to clean up. They take there time and put some thought behind the work they are doing. The wire maybe covered by drywall after but they take there time to tie them up and organize them. They don t leave a maze of wire they hide them making it hard for a nail to accidentally hit anything. Would recommend them to anyone looking for quality work. Great crew with amazing knowledge. Service: Installation

Repel updated  my entertainment system in November. Their prices were competitive but their services were great. They provided feedback on what was best and even suggested not replacing some of components to save us some  costs. When a slight programming issue arose after installation, they responded quickly and fixed it!  Highly recommend this family run company for your needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Glad you are enjoying your system.

reviews.review_text: Repel Technologies helped me with my new home build and provided all my audio/video, home automation, and sound acoustic treatments for my home theatre. Very knowledgeable staff! Staff was a pleasure to work with and was able to provide us with the experience we were looking for and on a reasonable budget. Would recommend these guys for anyone looking for custom audio/video and automation services!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! The pleasure was ours.

reviews.review_text: My not-tech-savy boomer parents wanted to put a projector/movie room in their brand new house. Repel was extremely patient with them and walked them through the different options and price points, creating multiple quotes along the way. The repel team communicated very well with our contractors even though they were extremely hard to deal with. We worked mostly with Alvin and Erik who were very friendly and knowledgable. They ended up also suggesting and installing a beautiful smart TV and sound bar in the living room and also installing our door bell system. The best part is they were able to connect all our devices to a single remote making everything extremely easy to use. My parents love their TVs and were extremely satisfied with Repels services! Thanks Repel!

Would like to say one BIG thank you to the owners of Repel Juji & Sam. From the day of meeting them right to the completion they were available helpful & communicative. All issues that arose during the process were rectified in a timely professional manner. Their technician Alex was truly amazing in his technical knowhow and service. In construction of a new home I felt they took care as if their own. I have recommended and will surely continue to recommend Repel. Great team including Jujis and Sams son Alvin. GUYS I appreciate your help & work. If i missed anyone I apologize. SEE ON THE NEXT PROJECT!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! Looking forward to the next one!

reviews.review_text: BEST PRICE IN TOWN with the same HIGH QUALITY products and service as other popular brands. Alvin, the owner, was very professional, knowledgeable, responsive, personable, and accommodating. He came on-site several times - something few companies do. They work VERY hard for you. One time, the painter ruined the HDMI cable, so Repel brought a new one - except it was defective, so they stayed a couple hours until Alvins brother brought a replacement and retested everything before they left. It was so easy to just leave a new cable without doing anything, but these guys do everything with diligence. We got their home monitoring install + service, security camera package, low voltage (TV/telephone/internet) install, home theatre package, central vacuum, water bug, you name it. Repel offers competitor top tier monitoring service package for a price cheaper than the competitors basic price! Weve used their products for 3 months now, and the only issue I had was with the security cameras. The manufacturer is from China and partially state-owned so Im a bit paranoid about installing their app on my phone. And weve had a couple of connectivity issues on the monitor. HOWEVER, it does the job so I cant complain. If you are deciding between Repel and another company, always, always, always choose Repel. Save yourself some trouble, time, and money.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind review Michael!

reviews.review_text: We recently built a new house and used Repel for our home automation.  They were able to hit our budget needs and still deliver on most of the technology that we wanted for our home build.  Juji is a very attentive business owner and Nick/Alex are skilled technicians.  I recommend their services if you are in the market for an affordable automation solution.  Additionally, I find their home monitoring excellent thus far.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Gordon, we are happy we could help the needs for your home!

reviews.review_text: We recently built a house and had a good experience with Repel.  The owner came into our home and did a walk thru with us on the products we picked and went over product locations with us.  Nick did all the rough in and was great to deal with and would call when he was unsure about something.  Alex comes in and does the finishing and was very capable at the job.  Would highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Kern, we really appreciate your kind words!

reviews.review_text: Contacted owner for upgrade of alarm system.  Alex the technician arrived promptly  and troubleshooted existing system and basically repaired existing after determining main board in great shape. Adjusted siren. Saved us hundreds. Thanks

Built my new home and couldnt be happier to have found this fantastic alarm home monitoring company.  Excellent service, knowledgeable and very prompt responses for any type of questions my wife or i would have.  Local company thats just trying to help one home at a time. They also have a system called control 4 that hooks up to your phone to allow you to operate your lights with a touch of a button at home or over your phone.  I would recommend this place to anyone thats thinking of replacing your old alarm system or looking for a new one.  Give them a chance, Im glad I did.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tom, we are glad you are happy with our service!

reviews.review_text: Great customer service during construction of our new house. Alvin was able to answer all of my questions and offer suggestions throughout the process. Very friendly family run business who care about their clients. Thanks to Justin and Alex as well!!
I got 3 quotes for a security system for a new home install and their price was the best. Very good communication and professional installers
its been a pleasant experience working with Repel guys. great team and very knowledgeable about security system. thanks again for the great service.
Great reliable company. Alvins been great to work with.

Sam was unprofessional and camera system broke down within few months after installation. After multiple calls Sam hasnt send  the technician for repair.They are using cheap Chinese cameras. I wont recommend this business to anyone
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi John, we are sorry to hear about your experience. Can you please call our office line at 604-322-6300 as we are having trouble locating our file records with your name (John K). We will look into this matter for you and rectify/provide a solution!

reviews.review_text: I agree 100% with the previous review. Repel installed a camera system which broke down after 1 year. They said it was only guaranteed for 1 year which was how long it lasted. I dont think a  reputable  company would have installed cheap  products knowing they wouldnt  last long.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, were sorry to hear about the trouble youve experienced. Our standard warranty offering is for 1 year. Please give our office a call and we can provide you with solutions for your issue. Our office can be reached at 604-322-6300.
Sorry we have no record of this name in our customer database? Could you please elaborate on this review?
Sorry we have no record of this name in our customer database? Could you please elaborate on this review?
